title: All Revealjs themes in one place !

```{css}
.slides {
    border: 3px solid #dee2e6;
    width: 100%;
}
```

This websites shows the demo presentation from https://quarto.org with a version for all available themes.

## Aims

- Discover what a theme looks like. 

- Easier control when we update themes. 

Navigate the menu or scroll below

## Revealjs Themed presentation

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
files <- fs::dir_ls("revealjs-themed/", recurse = TRUE, glob = "*/index.html")
theme <- fs::dir_ls("revealjs-themed/") |> gsub(pattern = "revealjs-themed/revealjs-", replacement = "", fixed = TRUE)
glue::glue("
### Theme {{glue::single_quote(theme)}}

::: {.slide-container}
`<iframe class='slides' src={{glue::double_quote(files)}} height=300px></iframe>`{=html}
:::

`<p><a href={{glue::double_quote(files)}} target='_blank'>View {{fs::path_file(fs::path_dir(files))}} in full screen</a></p>`{=html}

", .open = "{{", .close = "}}")
```
